about_the_game: "Lost Soul" is a multiplayer survival horror game that can accommodate 1-4 players. In this game, you must team up to free innocent people possessed by evil spirits, but be cautious as these spirits can appear suddenly. By making use of the environment and available items, you can fight against these horrible spirits, escape their pursuit and strategize with teammates. This game offers an experience of fear and adrenaline as you navigate the gameplay cautiously, so that you are not detected by the spirits. Join us now, summon your courage, scream with other players, and together, defeat the menacing spirits by using all the resources you have got!

short_description: “Lost Soul” is a multiplayer horror survival game for 1-4 players. Work together to rescue possessed souls, using your surroundings and strategy to fight and escape. Play cautiously to avoid detection while experiencing fear and excitement. Join with others, scream, and defeat the ominous threat.
